title: Romantically Apocalyptic - Book 1
description: I am the captain.The year is 20__ something something. I stopped counting a while ago, and therefore not sure what day it is. Humanity is virtually wiped out in a nuclear holocaust. Me and my last squad: pilot and sniper, live in the wasteland ruins of tomorrow.This is my story.I am captain.
author: Vitaly S. Alexius
